description: Detects suspicious encoded payloads in WMI Event Consumers Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Encoded Scripts in a WMI Consumer
query: Destination:(*V3JpdGVQcm9jZXNzTWVtb3J5* OR *dyaXRlUHJvY2Vzc01lbW9ye* OR *Xcml0ZVByb2Nlc3NNZW1vcn* OR *VGhpcyBwcm9ncmFtIGNhbm5vdCBiZSBydW4gaW4gRE9TIG1vZG* OR *RoaXMgcHJvZ3JhbSBjYW5ub3QgYmUgcnVuIGluIERPUyBtb2Rl* OR *UaGlzIHByb2dyYW0gY2Fubm90IGJlIHJ1biBpbiBET1MgbW9kZ* OR *VGhpcyBwcm9ncmFtIG11c3QgYmUgcnVuIHVuZGVyIFdpbjMy* OR *RoaXMgcHJvZ3JhbSBtdXN0IGJlIHJ1biB1bmRlciBXaW4zM* OR *UaGlzIHByb2dyYW0gbXVzdCBiZSBydW4gdW5kZXIgV2luMz*)
